contentrichtext.text: {{About|the hip-hop group||Bomb disposal}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = The Bomb Squad | image = | caption = | image_size = | background = group_or_band | origin = [[Long Island, New York|Long Island]], [[New York City]] [[United States]] | genre = [[Hip hop music|Hip hop]] | years_active = 1986â€“present | label = | instrument = | associated_acts = [[Public Enemy (band)|Public Enemy]], [[Slick Rick]], [[Ice Cube]] | website = | current_members = Hank Shocklee<br>Keith Shocklee<br>[[Chuck D]]<br>Eric "Vietnam" Sadler<br>[[Gary G-Wiz]]<br>Kerwin "Sleek" Young | past_members = | notable_instruments = }} '''The Bomb Squad''' is an American [[hip hop production]] team, known for their work with the [[rapping|rap]] group [[Public Enemy (band)|Public Enemy]]. ==Members== *[[Hank Shocklee]] *[[Keith Shocklee]] (Credited as Keith Matthew Boxlee) *[[Chuck D]] (Credited as Carl Ryder); also member of Public Enemy *Eric "Vietnam" Sadler (http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0755534/) *[[Gary G-Wiz]] (Gary Rinaldo) *[http://www.kerwinyoung.com Kerwin "Sleek" Young] ==Style and influence== The Bomb Squad are noted for their dense, distinct, innovative production style, often utilizing dozens of samples on just one track. They are also known for their ability to incorporate harsh, unmelodic sounds and samples into their songs.{{Citation needed|date=June 2010}} [[About.com]] ranked The Bomb Squad #7 on their "Top 50 Hip-Hop Producers" list.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://rap.about.com/od/toppicks/ss/Top50Producers_8.htm |title=Top 50 Hip-Hop Producers |author=Henry Adaso |coauthors=Ivan Rott, Renato P., Bhaskar S., Henry A. |publisher=[[About.com]] |page=8}}</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.publicenemy.com/#public Chuck D's official website] *[http://www.shocklee.com/#public Hank Shocklee's official website] *[http://www.keithshocklee.com/#public Keith Shocklee's official website] *[http://www.kerwinyoung.com/#public Kerwin Young's official website] *[http://www.spitdigital.com/#public Gary G-Wiz's official website] {{Public Enemy}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Bomb Squad}} [[Category:American hip hop groups]] [[Category:American hip hop record producers]]
